sentences.en: It is fine made by the animal concentrate and plant elite which live in the sandbank.
sentences.cn: 湿疹及皮肤干燥等情况而对应地采用耐干旱、长期较长的植物提取浓缩液与生活在沙丘地带的动物脂肪质精华液,再与温和的活性清洁剂科学调配而成.

sentences.en: Look at that sandbank over there.
Our ship grounded in shallow water / on a sandbank.
sentences.cn: 我们的船在浅水中[在沙滩上]搁浅.

sentences.en: President lary - Byrd expressed that the team will not sell outright the sandbank Si Li contract.
sentences.cn: 总裁拉里-伯德表示球队并不会买断汀斯利的合同.

sentences.en: The boat stuck on a sandbank but we soon got it afloat again.
sentences.cn: 小船在沙丘搁浅,没过多久我们就又使它航行自如了.

sentences.en: The sandbank was uncertain, like quicksand under his feet.
sentences.cn: 那个沙坝并不稳固，他脚下如同踩着流沙一般。

sentences.en: They were winning the boat race until their boat ran aground on a sandbank.
sentences.cn: 船在沙滩上搁浅之前,他们在划船比赛中一直是领先的.

sentences.en: We aground on a sandbank and had to sit it out until the next high tide.
sentences.cn: 我们的船搁浅在沙滩上,只能等待着下次潮水的到来.

sentences.en: We waited for the tide to float the boat off the sandbank.
sentences.cn: 我们等待涨潮,让潮水把船浮起离开沙滩.

trans.tran_en: a raised area of sand in a river, ocean etc
